original_title: From Oakland to Iceland: A Hip-Hop Homecoming
overview: From Oakland to Iceland: A Hip-Hop Homecoming is a documentary about Iceland native DJ Platurn, raised in California and his homecoming tour playing in Iceland where he has lived since the age of 7. The film explores his 3 week tour DJing for his native Icelanders, where he exhibits his talents as a scratch/trick DJ, among other things. DJ Platurn resides in Oakland, California.
title: From Oakland to Iceland: A Hip-Hop Homecoming
